title: Business Valuation Estimator
subtitle: Estimate a company's valuation using EBITDA and revenue multiples.
paragraphs: Use EBITDA and revenue multiples to quickly estimate a business valuation. Adjust assumptions to model comparable companies and market conditions.
Export reports as PDF or copy results to clipboard for sharing with investors or advisors.

faqs.a: An EBITDA multiple is a valuation metric based on earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization.
Use industry comparables and adjust based on growth, margins, and market conditions.
